chunks.zh: 哪吒票房第一。。。
chunks.en: Ne Zha is number one at the box office...

chunks.zh: 大佬们怎么看待哪吒票房第一，感觉后劲十足，太猛了。。。。
chunks.en: What do you big shots think about Ne Zha being number one at the box office? It feels like it has a lot of staying power, it's too powerful....

chunks.zh: v2 电影鉴赏家还是多啊，怕不都是小众剧情电影爱好者吧。
chunks.en: There are still a lot of movie connoisseurs on V2, I'm afraid they are all fans of niche plot-driven films.

chunks.zh: 这种特效大片剧情没有硬伤没有大雷的片子这几年真是掰着指头数吧。
chunks.en: You can really count on your fingers the number of special effects blockbusters with no major plot holes or bombs in recent years.

chunks.zh: 我都不说漫威喂屎了，对比阿凡达 2 都能高出一个阿凡达 1 。
chunks.en: I'm not even going to talk about Marvel feeding us crap, compared to Avatar 2, it's even better than Avatar 1.

chunks.zh: 全靠同行衬托   友商是傻逼  没错  我说的就是封神还有蛟龙行动  还有射雕
chunks.en: It all depends on the competition. Competitors are stupid. That's right, I'm talking about Creation of the Gods, Operation Red Sea, and Legend of the Condor Heroes.

chunks.zh: 第一部是跟老婆一起看的，看完我俩都挺喜欢，后来出去玩还买了我家为数不多的 2 个粘土人今天娃上学我特地请半天假跟老婆出来一起看了第二部，回去的时候老婆说下次出 3 了我们再一起来看
chunks.en: I watched the first one with my wife, and we both liked it a lot. Later, when we went out to play, we bought two of the few clay figures in our house. Today, my child is at school, so I took half a day off and came out with my wife to watch the second one together. When we went back, my wife said that next time the third one comes out, we will come and watch it together again.

chunks.zh: 我嘞个曲高和寡的 V2EX 啊，那我只能借总理的话来说了，人民群众喜闻乐见，你不喜欢，你算老几？
chunks.en: Oh my, such a highbrow and unpopular V2EX. Then I can only borrow the Premier's words, the people love to see it, if you don't like it, who do you think you are?

chunks.zh: @zfybot 苍白单调的剧情，中二的台词加上屎尿屁的烂梗的混合物，看完一部电影都很难说出看了些什么。
chunks.en: @zfybot Pale and monotonous plot, mixed with chuunibyou lines and disgusting toilet humor, it's hard to say what you watched after watching a movie.

chunks.zh: 确实是同行衬托的好啊。
chunks.en: It's true that the competition makes it look good.

chunks.zh: 不过如何是把定位放在漫威这种英雄题材下其实也马马虎虎。
chunks.en: But if you position it under the heroic theme of Marvel, it's actually just so-so.

chunks.zh: 「这是我看过最好看的动画电影」我杠精属性又来了，马上脑子灵机一动，如果是这样的话，那你看过「机器人总动员 WALL·E 」吗？
chunks.en: 'This is the best animated film I have ever seen.' My contrarian attribute is back, and I immediately have an idea, if that's the case, have you seen 'WALL·E'?

chunks.zh: @pdog18 #24 我就知道有这种 “艺术家” ，众人皆醉你独醒 👍
chunks.en: @pdog18 #24 I knew there would be this kind of 'artist', everyone else is drunk and you are the only one awake 👍

chunks.zh: 感觉真的很普通... 再选择一次我不会去看，主要是情怀，起码有点诚意的作品。虽然我不喜欢
chunks.en: It feels really ordinary... If I had to choose again, I wouldn't go to see it. Mainly because of nostalgia, at least it's a somewhat sincere work. Although I don't like it.

chunks.zh: @pdog18 #46 你的杠精属性杠错地方了，个人审美是非常主观的，跟自己的经历、认识高度相关，武无第二，文无第一，没有人可以让所有人都有跟自己一样的审美。
chunks.en: @pdog18 #46 Your contrarian attribute is arguing in the wrong place. Personal aesthetics are very subjective and are highly related to one's own experience and level of understanding. There is no second in martial arts, but there is no first in literature. No one can make everyone have the same aesthetic as themselves.

chunks.zh: 哪怕瓦力确实是部非常优秀的动画电影，也不影响有部分人认为哪吒是自己看过最好看的动画电影。
chunks.en: Even if WALL·E is indeed a very excellent animated film, it does not affect some people's opinion that Ne Zha is the best animated film they have ever seen.

chunks.zh: 还有好多人刚回城上班，还没空闲出来，等这一批回城的空闲下来后，估计哪吒 2 的票房能冲到 60-70 亿左右，现在是已经 53 亿了这次哪吒 2 再度爆火。
chunks.en: There are still many people who have just returned to the city to work and have not yet had time. After this group of people returning to the city have time, it is estimated that the box office of Ne Zha 2 can reach about 6-7 billion. It is already 5.3 billion now. Ne Zha 2 is a hit again this time.

chunks.zh: 除了第一部带来的好口碑外，还有就是有国漫的很多制作团队，参与了制作，凡人修仙传，熊出没，深海，白蛇，长安三万里等等加起来，前后 100 多家动漫团队携手打造的哪吒 2第一次看到国内的动漫公司这么齐心协力，只为中国动画
chunks.en: In addition to the good reputation brought by the first film, there are also many production teams of domestic animation who participated in the production. A Record of a Mortal’s Journey to Immortality, Boonie Bears, Deep Sea, White Snake, Chang An, etc., a total of more than 100 animation teams joined hands to create Ne Zha 2. This is the first time I have seen domestic animation companies working together so wholeheartedly, just for Chinese animation.

chunks.zh: 因为网上呼声很大，本打算去看看的，出门前看了下预告片，一句“我活不活无所谓，我只要你死”尬得我彻底放弃了观影的想法。
chunks.en: Because there was a lot of buzz online, I was planning to go see it. Before going out, I watched the trailer, and the line 'I don't care if I live or die, I just want you to die' was so cringe that I completely gave up the idea of watching the movie.

chunks.zh: 回忆一下，第一部我也觉得很一般，就记得那句“我命由我不由天”，让人感觉已经不是尴尬，而是不适。
chunks.en: Looking back, I thought the first movie was also very average. I only remember the line 'My fate is up to me, not heaven', which made people feel not just embarrassment, but discomfort.

chunks.zh: 究其原因，让一个小屁孩来讲大道理，还是算了吧，我就想说你能不能先赚钱养活自己再来怼天怼地。
chunks.en: The reason is that it's better not to let a little kid tell great truths. I just want to say, can you make money to support yourself before you argue with the heavens and the earth.

chunks.zh: 总之，这片不适合大人观看，因为太幼稚；也不建议大人带小孩子观看，只会让他在熊孩子的路上越走越远。
chunks.en: In short, this film is not suitable for adults to watch because it is too childish; it is also not recommended for adults to take children to watch, it will only make them go further and further down the road of being a mischievous child.

chunks.zh: @donnylai 喂屎喂多了，所以上来一份味儿不那么重的屎大家就都以为是香饽饽了
chunks.en: @donnylai They've been fed crap for too long, so when a piece of crap that doesn't taste so strong comes along, everyone thinks it's a treat.

chunks.zh: 之前看网上和朋友圈的评价都说很好看，去看的时候把我整的有点怀疑人生了，每次一到笑点，听到全场小朋友的笑声，我和我老婆就感觉有点无奈。
chunks.en: Before, I saw evaluations on the Internet and in my circle of friends saying that it was very good. When I went to see it, I was a little skeptical about my life. Every time there was a joke, I heard the laughter of the children in the audience, and my wife and I felt a little helpless.

chunks.zh: 前半段笑点有点低俗和尬，有点子供向，后半段开打起来了确实画面比较宏大，就是这一步喊得口号太多了。
chunks.en: The jokes in the first half were a bit vulgar and awkward, a bit childish. In the second half, when the fight started, the pictures were indeed grand, but there were too many slogans in this step.

chunks.zh: 还有鱿鱼吃自己以及全体焦黑陈塘官百姓有点地狱。
chunks.en: Also, the squid eating itself and all the scorched Chen Tangguan people are a bit hellish.

chunks.zh: 傻瓜式反派对口号，彩蛋里面徒弟大师傅的情节让我梦穿熊出没。
chunks.en: The stupid villain shouts slogans, and the plot of the apprentice and master in the easter eggs makes me dream of Boonie Bears.

chunks.zh: 憋了好几天其他平台不敢吐槽怕被粉丝骂。
chunks.en: I've been holding back for several days and didn't dare to complain on other platforms for fear of being scolded by fans.

chunks.zh: 作为商业电影可以，但是中国最好的话还是有点接受不了。
chunks.en: As a commercial film, it's okay, but it's still a bit unacceptable if it's the best in China.

chunks.zh: 剧情特效都不错，就是笑点和煽情点太尬。
chunks.en: The plot and special effects are good, but the jokes and sentimental moments are too awkward.

chunks.zh: 能拿票房冠军属于是天时地利人和
chunks.en: Being able to win the box office champion is due to the right timing, location, and people.

chunks.zh: @itenyh 这不活生生的小孩看了动漫 就变坏了。
chunks.en: @itenyh This is a living example of a child who turns bad after watching anime.

chunks.zh: 打了游戏人都变暴力了。
chunks.en: People become violent after playing games.

chunks.zh: 笑话
chunks.en: Joke

chunks.zh: 感谢同行衬托
chunks.en: Thanks to the competition

chunks.zh: 没啥看了，报复性消费，同行衬托。
chunks.en: There's nothing to watch, revenge spending, and the competition makes it look good.

chunks.zh: 这电影前面有些屎尿屁烂梗，后面观感还不错，只能说全靠同行衬托。
chunks.en: This movie has some disgusting toilet humor in the beginning, but the viewing experience is not bad later on. It can only be said that it all depends on the competition.

chunks.zh: 只能说同行太烂了
chunks.en: It can only be said that the competition is too bad.

chunks.zh: @git00ll #9 看了，感觉还行。
chunks.en: @git00ll #9 I watched it, it felt okay.

chunks.zh: 春节档就看了唐探和哪吒，幸亏没踩雷
chunks.en: I only watched Detective Chinatown and Ne Zha during the Spring Festival, luckily I didn't step on any landmines.

chunks.zh: @itenyh 我跟你的感受差不多，虽然网上一致好评也是很心动了，很想去看了。
chunks.en: @itenyh I feel the same way as you. Although the unanimous praise online is also very tempting, I really wanted to go see it.

chunks.zh: 但是看到那几句台词就兴趣淡淡了。
chunks.en: But I lost interest when I saw those lines.
